Class Cannon

java.lang.Object

public class Cannon
extends Item

This is the player. It is an item that moves laterally on the ground.

Constructor Detail

Cannon

public Cannon(int x,
              Space s)
Initialize the location of the cannon and space as per the supplied parameters. Only the x-coordinate is supplied, as the y-coordinate should always be 0 (because the cannon is always on the ground).

Cannon

public Cannon(Space s)
Assign the space and put the cannon at its bottom left corner.

Method Detail

moveLeft

public void moveLeft()
move one step to the left, if possible otherwise do nothing

moveRight

public void moveRight()
move one step to the right, if possible otherwise do nothing

shoot

public void shoot()
shoot by creating a bullet at the cannon's current location. the bullet should head north!
